title: Destructo, Destroyer of Balance
body:
Passive: Starts the game with 10k gold, cannot earn gold. (this is balanced because he can't earn gold and 10k isn't enough for full build).

Q: FahQueue ADC. Deal damage to target ADC equal to 100% of their HP in true damage (this is balanced because it only affects ADC's).

W: FahQueue AP. Deal damage to target AP champ equal to 100% of their HP in true damage (this is balanced because it only affects AP's).

E: FahQueue Tank. Deal damage to target tank equal to 100% of their HP in true damage (this is balanced because it only affects tanks).

R: FahQueue Everyone. Deal damage to all other champions equal to 100% of their HP in true damage (this is balanced because it kills your own team as well).

He has no way of dealing with supports apart from ult, so is totally balanced.

[disclaimer] If you don't know what this is about, read the other player created champs posted recently.
